fields.text: Welcome to Mozilla in San Francisco, where we keep the Internet open and accessible for everyone.
For developer resources and support, press [INDEX].
To get help with Firefox Developer Edition, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a developer support specialist.
To access MDN Web Docs and API references, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to the documentation help desk.
For information about Mozilla’s mission and career opportunities, press [INDEX].
To learn about our mission and values, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our outreach team.
To explore career opportunities at Mozilla, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our recruiting department.
